info.name: RESTful API with Java and SpringBoot 3

request.description: Deletes a Person by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the person!
Updates a Person by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the person!
Adds a new Person by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the person!
Deletes a Book by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the book!
Updates a Book by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the book!
Adds a new Book by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the book!
